features: 【ADVANCED 2.4G WIRELESS CONNECTION】 Say goodbye to tangled wires and enjoy a reliable and seamless connection with our advanced 2.4G wireless technology. Experience the freedom to move around and work efficiently without any signal interference.

【ADJUSTABLE DPI MOUSE】 Our mouse features adjustable DPI settings (800-1200-1600), allowing you to customize the cursor sensitivity to suit your preference and working style. From precise control to swift navigation, adapt the mouse speed to enhance your productivity.

【FULL-SIZE KEYBOARD WITH WRIST REST】 Enjoy comfortable typing with our full-size keyboard that includes a built-in wrist rest. The ergonomic design promotes proper hand and wrist alignment, reducing strain and fatigue during long typing sessions.

【LONG BATTERY LIFE】 The mouse requires a single AA battery, while the keyboard requires two AA batteries. With energy-efficient design, our combo provides long-lasting battery life, allowing you to work without interruption for extended periods.

【USB-C COMPATIBILITY】 We provide an additional USB-C adapter with the combo, allowing you to easily connect the keyboard and mouse to devices such as Mac and other USB-C enabled devices. Enjoy seamless compatibility and hassle-free connectivity.

【SIMPLE AND SLEEK DESIGN】 Our keyboard and mouse combo features a sleek and minimalist design, adding a touch of elegance to your workspace. The clean and professional appearance complements any office or home office environment.

【VERSATILE USAGE】 Perfect for office work, home office setups, and various computing needs, our combo works seamlessly with computers, laptops, Macs, and more. Enjoy efficient and comfortable typing and navigation across multiple devices.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Elevate your typing and computing experience today! Unlock the Ultimate Typing Experience - Perfect for both office and home use, our seemingly unassuming wireless keyboard and mouse set packs a punch when it comes to performance and ergonomics.

Adjustable stand Customizable keyboard height with adjustable footstand for versatile and ergonomic use. Effortless Connectivity The included USB-C adapter ensures compatibility with a wide range of devices, including Mac Precision Control Choose from three adjustable DPI settings - 800, 1200, and 1600 - for fine-tuned cursor precision. Silent Clicks Say goodbye to disruptive clicks while maintaining the same level of control and accuracy.

While it may appear conventional, this keyboard is a typing marvel. Designed for seamless and efficient typing, it effortlessly suits your office or home office needs. Plus, with the inclusion of distinct orange keys, it adds a touch of style to your workspace.

Say goodbye to wrist discomfort. Our set features a spacious 40mm wrist rest, offering optimal wrist support during extended typing sessions. Your comfort is our priority. Discover the perfect blend of performance, longevity, and ergonomic design in our wireless keyboard and mouse set.

Full-Size Shortcut Multimedia Keys Direction Customize your cursor speed with the three-level DPI adjustment on our mouse. It's designed with a curvaceous, ergonomic shape that fits your hand like a glove, promoting natural and comfortable hand positioning.

Model C4130 Interface USB-A/UCB-C adapter Wireless distance 33Fts Power Type 1*AA Battery（Keyboard）1*AA Battery（Mouse） （Battery not included） Mouse DP 800-1200-1600 DPI USB Receiver Open the box and see that not inside the keyboard and mouse Operating System Compatible with Windows, Mac, Chrome OS, Linux and DOS Feature Wireless, Ergonomic, Full Size, Palm Rest Style Wireless, For Laptop, PC, Computer, Numeric Keypad

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s good, a little loud for me but not bad

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars 3.5 stars - Returned due to serious color mismatch
reviews.reviewText: Update: customer service reached out after seeing my review and offered me a new set free. I ended up declining because I only wanted the mouse and they couldn't separate the set. They were very interested in "making it right" but in the end it was just a customer/product mismatch. But it does give me confidence to say, that if you have any issues they will be fast to respond and correct the issue.Original review: I ended up returning this for a couple of reasons, but the main one is that the color (purple) was not the pale lavender shown online or even on box, but instead an almost pink purple that looked like hot pink next to my purple set up.Other issues were:* forward and back buttons on the mouse were reversed (not intentionally, clearly based on the manual)* when mouse entered sleep mode, waking it up required turning it off and on again* media control function keys didn't work* no off button on keyboard (would make cleaning it a nightmare)There were a couple things I did like, however:* quiet click of the mouse. I normally like noisy accessories but the quiet was nice. Made me wish the keyboard was a little quiet because the juxtaposition was strange.* keyboard typed nicely. used it less than 10 hours after delivery to work from home and had no problem getting the grove of using it. It's a good size for me and I usually use the logitech wave (K350)* ergonomic fit of the mouse. seriously felt so good in my hand, I made sure to buy a similar one with the set I got to replace this one even though that set also comes with its own mouse.Overall, I don't NOT recommend it, but I don't eagerly say run out and get one asap. It's not bad for the price and takes little to no learning curve to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I actually love this keyboard. It was a little hard getting used to being so much bigger than my old one but it is actually comfortable and nice. The mouse is really awesome and comfortable as well. I bought a new computer so it was time to pink up my desk a bit and this is such a pretty pink. I love this set so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Making my office feminine one piece at a time 💗 the mouse is silent and clicks softly which I love, the keyboard is pretty large and tall on the stands and the clicks sounds great but not too loud so it doesn’t bother my office mates

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like the key board and it was a perfect color to match my office … the second day using it my buttons started not working and I didn’t have a keyboard for work I was really upset!
